<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">Shrek</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
							<p>Hace poco celebramos <a href="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/cine/a36455858/shrek-soy-una-pringada-podcast-esty-quesada/" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/cine/a36455858/shrek-soy-una-pringada-podcast-esty-quesada/">los 20 a&ntilde;os del estreno de Shrek con Soy una pringada</a>, su fan m&aacute;s ilustre. Ella explica mejor por qu&eacute; es tan maravillosa esta patada s&uacute;percreativa a todos los t&oacute;picos de los cuentos.</p>
			</div>

	
	
</div>




																				


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="48">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
							<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">4</span>
		
		
		<div class="product-slide-details noskim">
								</div>

		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Mejores comedias en Netflix: El show de Truman</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-freeform listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap" style="padding-bottom:56.2667%">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mejores-comedias-netflix-el-show-de-truman-1632305363.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mejores-comedias-netflix-el-show-de-truman-1632305363.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="el show de truman, en netflix" title="El show de Truman, en Netflix" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mejores-comedias-netflix-el-show-de-truman-1632305363.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
					</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">Netflix</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
							<p>Con los a&ntilde;os, la mejor pel&iacute;cula de <a href="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/libros/a33909468/jim-carrey-recuerdos-desinformacion-libro-biografia/" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/libros/a33909468/jim-carrey-recuerdos-desinformacion-libro-biografia/">Jim Carrey</a> se ha convertido en una especie de profec&iacute;a autocumplida. El inteligent&iacute;simo guion sobre un tipo que vive sin saberlo en un reality show, da para sonrisas pero tambi&eacute;n para encogimiento de coraz&oacute;n. La gran met&aacute;fora de la era de las redes sociales.</p>
			</div>

	
	
</div>




																				


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-square listicle-slide-image " data-id="49">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
							<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">3</span>
		
		
		<div class="product-slide-details noskim">
								</div>

		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Mejores comedias en Netflix: La vida de Brian</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-1x1 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/life-of-brian-1542597317.png?crop=0.702xw:1.00xh;0.136xw,0&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="Human, Facial hair, Portrait, Beard, " title="Human, Facial hair, Portrait, Beard, " class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/life-of-brian-1542597317.png?crop=0.702xw:1.00xh;0.136xw,0&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
					</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">Orion Pictures</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
							<p>Los Monty Python crearon una obra maestra con la historia de un hombre que nace en el albergue al lado de Jes&uacute;s y lleva una vida paralela a la suya, siendo confundido en muchas ocasiones con el Mes&iacute;as. Para nosotros es <a href="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/cine/g28758448/la-vida-de-brian-monty-python/" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/cine/g28758448/la-vida-de-brian-monty-python/">una de las mejores comedias de todos los tiempos</a>.<br></p>
			</div>

	
	
</div>




																				


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-square listicle-slide-image " data-id="50">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
							<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">2</span>
		
		
		<div class="product-slide-details noskim">
								</div>

		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Mejores comedias en Netflix: Mujeres al borde de un ataque de nervios</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-1x1 listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mujeres-al-borde-de-un-ataque-de-nervios-1581944929.jpg?crop=0.566xw:1.00xh;0.240xw,0&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="mejores comedias espa&ntilde;olas netflix" title="mejores comedias espa&ntilde;olas netflix" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mujeres-al-borde-de-un-ataque-de-nervios-1581944929.jpg?crop=0.566xw:1.00xh;0.240xw,0&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
					</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-copyright">Netflix</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
							<p>La pel&iacute;cula que lanz&oacute; al manchego Pedro Almod&oacute;var a la fama mundial sigue siendo una de sus mejores obras, especialmente si hablamos de su vertiente m&aacute;s c&oacute;mica. Todo comienza con la ruptura de una pareja y el alquiler de su lujoso piso, pero costar&iacute;a describir lo que prosigue. Llena de personajes inolvidables, el crimen y los celos nunca fueron tan divertidos.</p>
			</div>

	
	
</div>




																				


		

<div class="listicle-slide listicle-slide-landscape listicle-slide-image " data-id="51">
	<div class="listicle-slide-hed">
							<span class="listicle-slide-hed-number">1</span>
		
		
		<div class="product-slide-details noskim">
								</div>

		<span class="listicle-slide-hed-text">Mejores comedias en Netflix: Revancha ya</span>
	</div>

	
			<div class="listicle-slide-media-outer">
		









<div class="slide-media slide-media-freeform listicle-slide-media listicle-slide-media-image">
	<div class="slide-media-inner">
							<span class="slide-image-wrap" style="padding-bottom:66.6797%">
						
	
			<picture class=""><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/revancha-ya-1664975606.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 48rem)"></source><source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/revancha-ya-1664975606.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=768:*" media="(min-width: 30rem)"></source><img alt="camila mendes y maya hawke en revancha ya" title="Camila Mendes y Maya Hawke en Revancha ya" class="lazyimage lazyload" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/revancha-ya-1664975606.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*"></picture></span>
		
		
					</div>
</div>


								
<div class="image-credit listicle-slide-credit">
	<span class="image-photo-credit">Kim Simms/Netflix</span><span class="image-copyright">Netflix</span></div>

			</div>
	
	<div class="listicle-slide-dek">
							<p>Dos estrellas en alza como Camila Mendes y Maya Hawke protagonizan una de las pocas comedias recientes y originales de Netflix con merecido hueco en esta lista. Repleta de color y giros de guion hitchkonianos, <em>Revancha ya</em> es, sobre todo, un homenaje a todas las comedias de instituto. No confunde, sin embargo, el homenaje con la copia y logra ganar personalidad, frescura y sentido del presente, a la vez que nos devuelve a casa a trav&eacute;s de nuestra nostalgia por el g&eacute;nero.</p>
			</div>

	
	
</div>




																
			
										<div class="syndicate-source-link">
	<p>
		<span class="link-label">V&iacute;a:</span> <a href="https://www.esquire.com/entertainment/movies/g25217018/best-comedies-on-netflix/" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.esquire.com/entertainment/movies/g25217018/best-comedies-on-netflix/">Esquire US</a>
	</p>
</div>

<div class="simple-item transporter-simple-item grid-simple-item-last-mobile grid-simple-item-last-tablet ">

			
			<a href="/es/actualidad/cine/a42346333/punales-por-la-espalda-2-glass-onion-mejores-memes/" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Transporter" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="&#039;Puñales por la espalda 2&#039;: Los mejores memes" data-vars-ga-outbound-link="https://www.esquire.com/es/actualidad/cine/a42346333/punales-por-la-espalda-2-glass-onion-mejores-memes/" data-vars-ga-position="7" data-vars-ga-total-positions="11">

<script id="recirc-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="recirculation-module">
		<div class="recirculation-module-header">
			Más de

			<a class="recirculation-module-feed-link" href="<%= data.feed.url %>"><%= data.feed.title %></a>
		</div>

		<div class="recirculation-module-inner">
			<% _.each( data.content, function( item, index ) { %>
				<div class="simple-item recirculation-module-item">
					<a
						href="<%= item.url %>"
						data-vars-ga-ux-element="Right Rail"
						data-vars-ga-call-to-action="<%= _.escape(item.title) %>"
						data-vars-ga-position="<%= index + 1 %>"
						data-vars-ga-total-positions="<%= data.content.length %>"
					>
						<div class="recirculation-module-image">
							<% if ( item.image ) { %>
								<div class="full-item-image item-image recirculation-image">
									

<img alt="" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-src="<%= item.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof item.image.srcset !== "undefined" && item.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= item.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>


									<%
	var displayTypeTitle = item.displaytype._attributes.title;
	var contentTypeTitle = item.contenttype._attributes.title;

	var contentTypeIcon = {
		"Quizzes": "quiz",
		"Video": "play"
	}[ contentTypeTitle ];

	var displayTypeIcon = {
		"Gallery": "gallery"
	}[ displayTypeTitle ];

	var acceptedContentTypes = contentTypeTitle === "Quizzes" || contentTypeTitle === "Video";
	var acceptedDisplayTypes = displayTypeTitle === "Gallery";

	var showIcons = acceptedContentTypes || acceptedDisplayTypes;
%>

<% if ( showIcons ) { %>
	<div class="content-type-icon">
		<i class="icon icon-<% if ( contentTypeIcon ) { %><%= contentTypeIcon %><% } else { %><%= displayTypeIcon %><% } %>"></i>
	</div>
<% } %>

								</div>
							<% } else { %>
								<div class="recirculation-content-indicator">
									<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

								</div>
							<% } %>
						</div>

						<span class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title"><%= item.title %></span>
					</a>

					<% if ( item.sponsor ) { %>
							

<%
	var sponsorClass = {
		"1": "no-logo",
		"2": "presented-by",
		"3": "brand-logo",
		"4": "provided-by",
		"5": "created-for",
		"6": "custom-label"
	}[ item.sponsor.type ],
	siteName = item.sitename,
	customLabelLong = item.sponsor.custom_label_long,
	customLabelShort = item.sponsor.custom_label_short;
%>

<% if ( sponsorClass != "no-logo" ) { %>
	<div class="sponsor sponsor-inline simple-item-sponsor recirculation-sponsor <%= sponsorClass %>">
		<div class="sponsor-label">
			<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
					<span class="site-name"><%= siteName %></span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "created-for" ) { %>
				<span class="created-for--short" >
					Creado para
				</span>

				<span class="created-for--long" >
					Creado por <%= siteName %> para
				</span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "custom-label" ) { %>
				<span class="custom-label--short" >
					<%= customLabelShort %>
				</span>

				<span class="custom-label--long" >
					<%= customLabelLong %>
				</span>
			<% } else { %>
				<% if ( sponsorClass === "presented-by" ) { %>
					Ofrecido por
				<% } %>

				<% if ( sponsorClass === "provided-by" ) { %>
					Creado por
				<% } %>
			<% } %>
		</div>
		<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
			<span class="sponsor-logo-separator">+ </span>
		<% } %>
		<div class="sponsor-image">
			<%= item.sponsor.brand %>
		</div>
			</div>
<% } %>

					<% } %>
				</div>
			<% } ); %>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>

				</main>
					<!-- footers/main -->

	<div class="footer-inner">
		<div class="footer-logo">

	<svg viewBox="0 0 783 116" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

</svg>


			</a>
		</div>

window.GLIMMER_BASE_URL = "//glimmer.hearstapps.com/";

/**
 * Loads the Consent Management (CMP) script
 */
const oneTrustDomainId = 'f1c3296c-93c2-4441-872b-5095004a2d31';

function loadCmpScript(doc, win) {
	const search = window.location.search;
	const ua = navigator.userAgent;
	const env = /docker|hearstapps/i.test(doc.location.hostname) ? 'stage' : 'prod';
	const docBody = doc.body || doc.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
	const siteCountry = 'ES'.toLowerCase();

	win.cmpUtils = {
		/**
		 * Config & Default consent state
		 */
		ccpaOptOut: false,
		debug: [],
		haveConsent: false,
		timerStart: Date.now(),

		/**
		 * Scroll fix for OneTrust consent & preference center modals
		 */
		checkOtTextScroll(sel) {
			setTimeout(function() {
				var otp = doc.querySelector(sel);
				if (otp && otp.scrollTop > 0) {
					otp.scrollTop = 0;
				}
			}, 250);
		},

		/**
		 * CCPA Forms Request Types
		 */
		formRequestTypes: [
			'Global DNS',
			'Do Not Sell My Information',
			'Delete My Personal Information',
			'Access My Personal Information',
		],

		/**
		 * Event Dispatch Wrapper Method
		 *
		 * @param {string} name
		 * @param {object} options
		 */
		emitEvent(name, options = {}) {
			win.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent(name, { detail: options }));
		},

		/**
		 * Event handler for OneTrust forms completion
		 *
		 * @param {object} event
		 * @returns
		 */
		formCompletionHandler(event) {
			if (!event.origin.includes('onetrust')) return;

			win.cmpUtils.log('formCompletionHandler', 'event', event);

			const { data } = event;
			const parsedData = JSON.parse(data);

			win.scrollTo(0, 0);

			const matchedRequest = win.cmpUtils.formRequestTypes.filter(function matchReq(req) {
				return parsedData.requestTypes.includes(req);
			});

			if (matchedRequest.length > 0) {
				// Full CCPA Opt Out on successful form submission
				win.Optanon.RejectAll();

				win.removeEventListener('click', win.cmpUtils.formCompletionHandler);
			}
		},

		/**
		 * Returns a regex match on the document.cookie object, capturing the value
		 * https://regex101.com/r/yaCpvJ/1
		 *
		 * @param {*} name
		 * @returns {*} - value passed if matched
		 */
		getCookieMatch: (name) => doc.cookie.match(`[; ]*${name}=([^;]+)`),

		/**
		 * Returns the CCPA Opt Out Value from the 'usprivacy' cookie if present
		 *
		 * @returns {boolean}
		 */
		getCCPAOptOut() {
			const usprivacy = win.cmpUtils.getCookieMatch('usprivacy');
			win.cmpUtils.ccpaOptOut = !!(usprivacy && usprivacy[1].charAt(2) === 'Y');
			return win.cmpUtils.ccpaOptOut;
		},

		/**
		 * Gets the Consent Groups via 'OptanonConsent' cookie value
		 *
		 * @returns {object} - consent groups and partial consent
		 */
		getConsentGroups() {
			let partialConsent = false;
			// Check for consent via cookie value
			const onetrustCookieVal = win.cmpUtils.getCookieMatch('OptanonConsent');

			let cmpConsentGroups = '';
			if (onetrustCookieVal) {
				let groups = onetrustCookieVal[1].match(/groups=(.*?)(&|$)/);
				const interactionCount = onetrustCookieVal[1].match(/interactionCount=(.*?)(&|$)/);

				win.cmpUtils.log('cmpUtils - getConsentGroups', 'groups', groups[1]);
				win.cmpUtils.log('cmpUtils - getConsentGroups', 'interactionCount', interactionCount[1]);

				if (groups) {
					groups = decodeURIComponent(groups[1]).split(',');
					groups.forEach(function handleGroup(group) {
						if (group.includes(':')) {
							const gs = group.split(':');
							if (gs[1] === '1') {
								cmpConsentGroups += (cmpConsentGroups ? ',' : '') + gs[0];
								// show partial consent only after initial interaction
							} else if (gs[1] === '0' && interactionCount[1] > 0) {
								partialConsent = true;
							}
						}
					});
				}
			}

			return { cmpConsentGroups, partialConsent };
		},

		/**
		 * Retrieves any country overrides set at site.metadata
		 *
		 * @param {object} locale
		 * @param {object} metadata
		 * @returns {object}
		 */
		getGDPRCountryOverrides(adConfig = {}) {
			if (!adConfig) return {};

			let userCountry = false;
			const { modules } = adConfig ?? {};

			const oneTrustModule = modules?.oneTrust;

			const getCountryOverrides = (countrySent) => oneTrustModule?.countries?.[countrySent] || {};
			// Assign the site's country (takes precedence over user country)
			let finalCountry = siteCountry;
			let oneTrustOverrides = getCountryOverrides(siteCountry);

			// Check to see if the adConfig has country overrides for OneTrust
			// If it doesn't check the user country from the location_data cookie
			if (oneTrustOverrides && Object.keys(oneTrustOverrides).length === 0) {
				userCountry = win.cmpUtils.getUserCountry();
				oneTrustOverrides = getCountryOverrides(userCountry);
				if (oneTrustOverrides && Object.keys(oneTrustOverrides).length > 0) {
					finalCountry = userCountry;
				}
			}

			return {
				country: finalCountry,
				...oneTrustOverrides,
				...oneTrustModule?.countries,
			};
		},

		/**
		 * Returns the Global Privacy Control (GPC) Value from the browser
		 *
		 * @returns {boolean}
		 */
		getGPCStatus() {
			return !!(navigator && navigator.globalPrivacyControl);
		},

		/**
		 * Gets the User's location data from the Fastly set `location_data` cookie
		 *
		 * @returns {*}
		 */
		getLocationDataCookie() {
			const locationData = win.cmpUtils.getCookieMatch('location_data');
			return locationData ? JSON.parse(locationData[1]) : '';
		},

		/**
		 * Retrieves the user's country code from the Fastly 'location_data' cookie
		 * @returns {string}
		 */
		getUserCountry() {
			// Get location cookie set by Fastly
			const locationDataCookie = win.cmpUtils.getLocationDataCookie();
			// Get country code from location cookie
			const { country_code: countryCode } = locationDataCookie;

			return countryCode ? countryCode.toLowerCase() : false;
		},

		/**
		 * Check if OneTrust Modal is present
		 */
		hasModal: () => !!doc.querySelector('#onetrust-banner-sdk'),

		/**
		 * Logs when OneTrust script is loaded
		 */
		handleOtLoad(e) {
			win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript', 'handleOtLoad - e', e);
		},

		/**
		 * Loads the IAB CCPA Script
		 */
		loadIabCcpaScript() {
			const script = doc.createElement('script');
			script.id = 'ot-ccpa-iab-script';
			script.src = 'https://cdn.cookielaw.org/opt-out/otCCPAiab.js';
			script.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
			script.setAttribute('charset', 'UTF-8');
			script.setAttribute('ccpa-opt-out-ids', ['C0004'].join(','));
			script.setAttribute('ccpa-opt-out-geo', 'us');
			script.setAttribute('ccpa-opt-out-lspa', 'false');

			docBody.appendChild(script);

			win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - loadIabCcpaScript', 'script', script);

			// After the script loads, fire the "consent.onetrust" event
			// until the uspData is available or timeout reached
			script.addEventListener(
				'load',
				function handleLoad() {
					let intv = 0;
					const t = setInterval(function checkIntv() {
						// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef,no-unused-vars
						__uspapi('getUSPData', 1, function checkUspData(uspData, success) {
							if (uspData.uspString !== null || intv === 50) {
								// Get Inital CCPA Opt Out
								win.CMP_CCPA_OPTOUT = win.cmpUtils.getCCPAOptOut();
								win.cmpUtils.log(
									'loadCmpScript - loadIabCcpaScript',
									'uspData.uspString',
									uspData.uspString
								);
								clearInterval(t);
							}
						});
						intv += 1;
					}, 200);
				},
				{ once: true }
			);
		},

		/**
		 * Keeps a log of the CMP events
		 *
		 * @param {*} name
		 * @param {*} evt
		 * @param {*} msg
		 */
		log(name, evt, msg) {
			const ts = Date.now() - win.cmpUtils.timerStart;
			win.cmpUtils.debug.push({
				name,
				evt,
				msg,
				ts,
			});
		},

		/**
		 * Shows the OneTrust Consent Modal's decline button
		 * - primarily used for Italy sites/users
		 */
		showOTDeclineButton() {
			const otModal = doc.querySelector('#onetrust-banner-sdk');
			if (otModal) otModal.classList.add('with-decline-option');
		},

		/**
		 * Updates CCPA form iframe styles (heights)
		 */
		updateFormIframeStyles(formFrame) {
			if (formFrame) {
				const formContInner = formFrame.parentElement;
				const formContEmbed = formContInner.parentElement;
				const formContBody = formContEmbed.parentElement;
				const formContMain = formContBody.parentElement.parentElement;
				formContInner.classList.add('onetrust-do-not-sell-form-embed-inner');
				formContEmbed.classList.add('onetrust-do-not-sell-form-embed');
				formContBody.classList.add('onetrust-do-not-sell-form-body');
				formContMain.classList.add('onetrust-do-not-sell-form-content');
				formFrame.classList.add('onetrust-do-not-sell-form');
			}
		},

		/**
		 * Wait for OptanonAlertBoxClosed Cookie to be set
		 */
		waitForOTCookie(name) {
			// time counter to avoid infinite loop when OptanonAlertBoxClosed does not exist
			let counter = 0;
			function assignOTCookiePromise(resolve, reject) {
				if (counter >= 1000) reject(`${name} does not exist`);
				if (win.cmpUtils.getCookieMatch(name)) {
					resolve(true);
				} else if (counter < 1000) {
					counter += 100;
					setTimeout(assignOTCookiePromise.bind(this, resolve, reject), 100);
				}
			}
			return new Promise(assignOTCookiePromise);
		},
	};

	/**
	 * Loads the Consent Management Logic - OneTrust
	 */
	function loadCmpScriptLogic() {
		win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - loaded', 'cmpUtils', win.cmpUtils);

		const adConfig = {"bu":"HMIES","site":"esquirees","zone":"\/36117602\/hmies-esquire\/","bidders":{"IX":{"d":{"ga":"670316","gb":"670320","la":"670315","lb":"670321","brk":"670318","garb":"670317","brkrr":"670319"},"m":{"ga":"670322","gb":"670323","lb":"670325","adh":"670326","brk":"670324"}},"APN":{"d":{"ga":"12105453","gb":"12105478","la":"12105490","lb":"12105500","brk":"14496717","brkrr":"14496696"},"m":{"ga":"12105510","gb":"12105511","lb":"12105512","brk":"14665539"},"v":"23334256"},"TDS":{"d":{"tdsArt":"119930","tdsBrk":"119931"},"m":{"tdsArt":"119931"},"pageId":"110310","pageIdDesktop300":"115690"},"TPL":{"d":{"ga":"esquire_templated_300x400_atf_PB","gb":"esquire_templated_300x400_btf_PB","lb":"esquire_970x250_btf_PB","brkrr":"esquire_templated_300x400_breaker_PB","la728":"esquire_728x90_HDX_PB","la970":"esquire_970x250_PB"},"m":{"ga":"esquire_templated_300x250_flex_atf_m_PB","lb":"esquire_templated_300x250_flex_btf_m_PB","brk":"esquire_templated_300x250_flex_breaker_m_PB"}},"TTD":{"d":{"ttd":"desktop"},"m":{"ttd":"mobile"},"siteId":"hmies-esquire","supplySourceId":"hearstmagazines"},"AMZN":"3788"},"modules":{"comscore":{"c2":11398592},"oneTrust":{"countries":{"it":{"declineButton":true,"cookieExpiration":false}}},"permutive":{"apiKey":"d3f6eeca-1f6f-4d45-92c2-5e7f95b12b3a","locale":"ES","currency":"EUR","workspaceId":"cb464016-b8d0-471e-a51d-af2461e7d84b"},"googleAnalytics":{"propertyId":"UA-101071517-1","measurementId":"G-ZF46D4DB23","brandMeasurementId":"G-3RET6VT9F2"}},"adBundle":[],"adBundleUrl":"https:\/\/assets.hearstapps.com\/moapt\/moapt-hdm.latest.js"};
		const hasWwwInHostName = win.location.hostname.startsWith('www');
		const userCountry = win.cmpUtils.getUserCountry();

		const gdprCountryOverrides = win.cmpUtils.getGDPRCountryOverrides(adConfig);

		win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript', 'gdprCountryOverrides', gdprCountryOverrides);

		// Add overwrite cookie flag from metadata or default to true - MOAPT-1284
		// Check to see if the adConfig has country cookie overrides for OneTrust
		// If it doesn't check the user country from the location_data cookie
		const overwriteCookie = gdprCountryOverrides?.cookieExpiration !== undefined
			? gdprCountryOverrides.cookieExpiration
			: true;

		// Cookie Choices Button - used to trigger preference center modal event
		const gdprCookieChoicesButton = doc.querySelector('.ot-sdk-show-settings');
		if (gdprCookieChoicesButton) {
			gdprCookieChoicesButton.addEventListener(
				'click',
				function emit() {
					win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('onetrust_pc_modal');
				},
				false
			);
		}

		/**
		 * OneTrust Callback
		 * Callback executed by OneTrust once their vendor script is loaded.
		 */
		win.OptanonWrapper = function optanonWrapper() {
			// Wait for OneTrust cookie information to be set/present
			win.cmpUtils.waitForOTCookie('OptanonConsent').then(() => {
				// Global function used by video and tags to determine if a GDPR consent modal is showing
				// TODO: remove duplicate vars after migrate to CMP vocab
				win.GDPR_CONSENT_MODAL = win.cmpUtils.hasModal;
				win.CMP_CONSENT_MODAL = win.cmpUtils.hasModal;

				// Get Consent Groups
				const { cmpConsentGroups, partialConsent } = win.cmpUtils.getConsentGroups();
				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'cmpConsentGroups', cmpConsentGroups);
				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'partialConsent', partialConsent);

				// Set Consent Groups into Global
				// TODO: remove duplicate vars after migrate to CMP vocab
				win.GDPR_CONSENT_GROUPS = cmpConsentGroups;
				win.CMP_CONSENT_GROUPS = cmpConsentGroups;

				// Get CCPA Opt Out
				win.CMP_CCPA_OPTOUT = win.cmpUtils.getCCPAOptOut();

				// Get GPC Status
				win.CMP_GPC_SET = win.cmpUtils.getGPCStatus();

				// If consent in any of categories 2 through 5 - check for YES consent
				win.cmpUtils.haveConsent = !!/C0002|C0003|C0004|C0005/.test(cmpConsentGroups);

				win.cmpUtils.log(
					'loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper',
					'cmpUtils.haveConsent',
					win.cmpUtils.haveConsent
				);

				// Set consent state as a global variable for use by tags
				// - Caution: this is a generic consent value
				// - Consent should be checked by cookie category or vendor ID
				// - See details here:
				//   https://www.notion.so/mediaos/GDPR-Consent-Management-38127bd6b9904408a809a9946a358d9f
				// TODO: remove duplicate vars after migrate to CMP vocab
				win.GDPR_CONSENT = !!win.cmpUtils.haveConsent;
				win.CMP_CONSENT = !!win.cmpUtils.haveConsent;

				// Check for partial consent and set global if true
				if (partialConsent) {
					// TODO: remove duplicate vars after migrate to CMP vocab
					win.GDPR_PARTIAL_CONSENT = true;
					win.CMP_PARTIAL_CONSENT = true;
				}

				// Get the OptanonAlertBoxClosed Cookie
				const onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal = win.cmpUtils.getCookieMatch('OptanonAlertBoxClosed');

				// If consent has been withdrawn set a global variable for use by tags
				if (!win.cmpUtils.haveConsent && onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal) {
					// TODO: remove duplicate vars after migrate to CMP vocab
					win.GDPR_WITHDRAWN = true;
					win.CMP_WITHDRAWN = true;
				}

				// Get datestamp from the OptanonAlertBoxClosed cookie if it exists
				const otAbcCookieTimestamp = onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal
					? new Date(onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal[1]).getTime()
					: 0;
				win.cmpUtils.log(
					'loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper',
					'otAbcCookieTimestamp',
					otAbcCookieTimestamp
				);
				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'overwriteCookie', overwriteCookie);

				// IF there is NO consent and cookie timestamp is more than 12 hours ago
				if (
					!win.cmpUtils.haveConsent &&
					overwriteCookie &&
					otAbcCookieTimestamp - (Date.now() - 1000 * 60 * 60 * 12) < 0
				) {
					// Expire the OptanonAlertBox cookie which allows the OneTrust modal to appear
					let cookieString = 'OptanonAlertBoxClosed=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT;path=/;';
					// Production domains need to have cookie domain explicitly set
					if (hasWwwInHostName) {
						const cookieDomain = win.location.hostname.replace('www', '');
						cookieString += `domain=${cookieDomain};`;
					}
					win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript', 'expire cookie', true);
					doc.cookie = cookieString;
				}

				// this check if approve or not
				// Maximum waiting time for the last user action in milliseconds
				const MAX_TIME_ACTION = 250;
				const recentAction = otAbcCookieTimestamp
					? Date.now() - otAbcCookieTimestamp < MAX_TIME_ACTION
					: false;

				// OptanonActiveGroups is a global variable that stores the current OneTrust consent status
				// If one of the categories C0002 through C0005 are present means we have targeting consent
				const haveCurrentConsent = /C0002|C0003|C0004|C0005/.test(win.OptanonActiveGroups);

				// Modal load tracking:
				const modalShowing = win.cmpUtils.hasModal();

				if (modalShowing) {
					// Send event for GA tracking if it hasn't happened;
					if (!win.ga_modal_tracking) {
						win.ONETRUST_MODAL = true;
						win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'modal event', 'onetrust_modal');
						win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('onetrust_modal');
					}

					// Learn More Button - used to trigger preference center modal event
					const gdprLearnMoreButton = doc.querySelector('#onetrust-pc-btn-handler');
					if (gdprLearnMoreButton) {
						gdprLearnMoreButton.addEventListener(
							'click',
							function emit() {
								win.cmpUtils.log(
									'loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper',
									'modal event',
									'onetrust_pc_modal'
								);
								win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('onetrust_pc_modal');
							},
							{ once: true }
						);
					}

					// Unhide Decline Button for Sites
					if (gdprCountryOverrides?.declineButton) win.cmpUtils.showOTDeclineButton();
				}

				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'modalShowing', modalShowing);
				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'recentAction', recentAction);

				// Refresh the page on modal consent or declines
				if (modalShowing && recentAction) {
					// If we have consent or not
					if (haveCurrentConsent) {
						win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'modal event', 'onetrust_accept');
						win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('onetrust_accept');
					} else {
						// If we previously had consent, refresh the page when we no longer have consent
						win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper', 'modal event', 'onetrust_reject');
						win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('onetrust_reject');
					}
					win.cmpUtils.waitForOTCookie('OptanonAlertBoxClosed').then(() => doc.location.reload());
				}

				// Send CMP Set event with consent callback
				// TODO: remove duplicate vars after migrate to CMP vocab
				win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('gdpr.consent.set', { haveConsent: !!win.cmpUtils.haveConsent });
				win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('cmp.consent.set', { haveConsent: !!win.cmpUtils.haveConsent });
				win.cmpUtils.log(
					'loadCmpScript - OptanonWrapper',
					'finished - cmpUtils.haveConsent',
					win.cmpUtils.haveConsent
				);
			});
		};

		// Main Listener for OneTrust
		win.addEventListener(
			'consent.onetrust',
			function handleConsentOneTrustEvent(e) {
				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript', 'Event - consent.onetrust - e', e);
			},
			false
		);

		// Listen for OneTrust Groups assignment
		win.addEventListener(
			'OneTrustGroupsUpdated',
			function handleOneTrustGroupsUpdatedEvent(e) {
				// Load IAB CCPA Script if user is in US
				if (userCountry === 'us') win.cmpUtils.loadIabCcpaScript();

				// Adjust CCPA Iframe Styles (heights) if present
				const oneTrustForm = doc.querySelector('iframe[data-src*="onetrust.com/webform"]');
				if (oneTrustForm) win.cmpUtils.updateFormIframeStyles(oneTrustForm);

				win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpScript', 'Event - OneTrustGroupsUpdated - e', e);
			},
			false
		);

		// Listen for OneTrust Consent Modal
		win.addEventListener('onetrust_modal', function handleOneTrustModalEvent() {
			win.cmpUtils.checkOtTextScroll('#onetrust-policy');
		}, { once: true });

		// Listen for OneTrust Preferences Center Modal
		win.addEventListener('onetrust_pc_modal', function handleOneTrustPrefCenterModalEvent() {
			win.cmpUtils.checkOtTextScroll('#ot-pc-content');
		}, false);

		// A postMessage will be sent upon a successful OneTrust form submission
		win.addEventListener('message', win.cmpUtils.formCompletionHandler, false);
	}

	/**
	 * Load OneTrust SDK Script
	 */
	(function loadOneTrust() {
		/**
		 * Disable OneTrust CMP if:
		 * - query param "disableCMP" is present
		 * - the user agent is "Chrome-Lighthouse" or "PTST" from the automated build tests
		 */
		if (~search.indexOf('disableCMP') && (~ua.indexOf('Chrome-Lighthouse') || ~ua.indexOf('PTST')) ) return;

		// Load script with callback/onload
		const domainId = `${oneTrustDomainId}${(env === 'stage') ? '-test' : ''}`;
		const s = doc.createElement('script');
		s.type = 'text/javascript';
		s.async = true;
		s.onload = win.cmpUtils.handleOtLoad;
		s.charset = 'UTF-8';
		s.src = 'https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js';
		s.setAttribute('data-domain-script', domainId);
		s.setAttribute('data-document-language', 'true');
		docBody.appendChild(s);
	})();

	/**
	 * Load OneTrust SDK Script Logic
	 */
	loadCmpScriptLogic();
};

/**
 * Loads the CMP bypass script
 * - Sends event to notify CMP has been bypassed
 */
function loadCmpBypassScript(win) {
	win.cmpUtils = {
		/**
		 * Config
		 */
		debug: [],
		timerStart: Date.now(),
		bypassed: false,

		/**
		 * Event Dispatch Wrapper Method
		 *
		 * @param {string} name
		 * @param {object} options
		 */
		emitEvent: (name, options = {}) => {
			win.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent(name, { detail: options }));
		},

		/**
		 * Keeps a log of the CMP events
		 *
		 * @param {*} name
		 * @param {*} evt
		 * @param {*} msg
		 */
		log(name, evt, msg) {
			const ts = Date.now() - win.cmpUtils.timerStart;
			win.cmpUtils.debug.push({
				name,
				evt,
				msg,
				ts,
			});
		},
	};

	/**
	 * Loads the Consent Management Bypass Event - OneTrust
	 */
	function loadCmpBypassEvent() {
		win.cmpUtils.emitEvent('cmp.consent.bypassed', {});
		win.cmpUtils.bypassed = true;
		win.cmpUtils.log('loadCmpBypassScript', 'CMP bypassed', true);
	}

	loadCmpBypassEvent();
}

// If OneTrust Domain ID load the script and logic
// otherwise, run bypass
if (oneTrustDomainId) {
	loadCmpScript(document, window);
} else {
	loadCmpBypassScript(window);
}

/**
 * Loads the relevant tag manager scripts
 * considers:
 * - GDPR and consent status
 * - Ads Free status
 */
(function loadTagManagerScript(doc, win) {
	const search = window.location.search;
	const ua = navigator.userAgent;

	/**
	 * Disable Tag Manager if:
	 * - query param "disableTagManager" is present
	 * - the user agent is "Chrome-Lighthouse" or "PTST" from the automated build tests
	 */
	if (~search.indexOf('disableTagManager') && (~ua.indexOf('Chrome-Lighthouse') || ~ua.indexOf('PTST')) ) return;

	const docBody = doc.body || doc.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];

	/**
	 * Creates a script tag to append
	 *
	 * @param {object} d (document)
	 * @param {string} id
	 * @param {string} src
	 * @param {boolean} defer
	 * @returns {object} - script element
	 */
	function createScript(d, id, src, defer = false) {
		const script = d.createElement('script');
		script.id = id;
		script.src = src;
		// programmatic scripts are asynchronous by default
		script.defer = defer;
		return script;
	}

	/**
	 * Load Tag Manager script
	 */
	function loadTagManager() {
		const isGDPR = '1';
		const isAdsFree = '';
		const base = '//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-es/Bootstrap.js';
		const dev = '//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-es-dev/Bootstrap.js';
		const dnt = '//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-es-dnt/Bootstrap.js';
		const gdpr = '//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-es/Bootstrap.js';
		const adsFree = '';

		if (!base) return;

		// If consent for categories 2 through 5 - check for YES consent
		const haveConsent = win.GDPR_CONSENT;

		// If chose CCPA Opt Out
		const ccpaOptOut = win.CMP_CCPA_OPTOUT;

		// If has GPC enabled
		const gpcSet = win.CMP_GPC_SET;

		let tagManagerScript = base;
		if (isGDPR) tagManagerScript = haveConsent ? gdpr : dnt;
		if (ccpaOptOut || gpcSet) tagManagerScript = dnt;
		if (isAdsFree) tagManagerScript = adsFree;

		const src = `${doc.cookie.includes('nsghtn=d') ? dev : tagManagerScript}`;
		const addTag = () => docBody.appendChild(createScript(doc, 'tag-manager-script', src, true));

		addTag();
	}

	/**
	 * Load Google Tag Manager script
	 */
	function loadGoogleTagManager() {
		const googleTagManagerId = '';

		if (!googleTagManagerId) return;

		win.dataLayer = win.dataLayer || [];
		win.dataLayer.push({
			'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(),
			event: 'gtm.js',
		});

		const src = `https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=${googleTagManagerId}&l=dataLayer`;
		const addTag = () => docBody.appendChild(createScript(doc, 'google-tag-manager-script', src, true));

		addTag();
	}

	if (window.cmpUtils && window.cmpUtils.bypassed) {
		loadTagManager();
		loadGoogleTagManager();
	} else {
		// Listen for consent event, then load the tag manager
		window.addEventListener('cmp.consent.set', () => {
			loadTagManager();
			loadGoogleTagManager();
		}, false);
		window.addEventListener('cmp.consent.bypassed', () => {
			loadTagManager();
			loadGoogleTagManager();
		}, false);
	}

})(document, window);

</script>
		</body>
	</html>
